prompts: Create a jellyfish-like Pokemon with translucent features and glowing accents.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles an alien creature with an ethereal appearance.
Imagine a mysterious creature with a flowing, ghostly body and unique tentacle-like structures.
Make a Pokemon that embodies a mix of beauty and danger, with a shimmering form.
Design an otherworldly Pokemon that floats gracefully with colorful, luminescent details.
Show me a Pokemon resembling an ancient oceanic entity with a mesmerizing design.
Give me a unique creature that combines elements of both jellyfish and extraterrestrial life.
